name: Sexy Miss
description:
Girls compete with each other for the title of Miss.Take part in the show as jury and decide which girl’s dream will becometrue and choose the winner.

Will their dreams become true? Don’t keep them waiting!

Girls appear in four categories in different outfits, you can vote for girls giving from one to five points,
the girl who gets the most points wins.

You can also take pictures for your collection during the show.

Featured:

- Eleven Girls
- Different outfits
- Four stages
- Vote miss
- Relax music
- Taking pictures
